sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-dialog
    :visible="visible"
    title="Создать тариф"
    width="500px"
    :before-close="onCancel"
  >
    <el-form
      :model="form"
      :rules="rules"
      ref="formRef"
      label-width="120px"
    >
      <el-form-item label="Код" prop="code">
        <el-input v-model="form.code" />
      </el-form-item>

      <el-form-item label="Название" prop="name">
        <el-input v-model="form.name" />
      </el-form-item>

      <el-form-item label="Цена, руб" prop="price">
        <el-input-number v-model="form.price" :min="0" />
      </el-form-item>

      <el-form-item label="Период" prop="unit_measurement">
        <el-select v-model="form.unit_measurement" placeholder="Выберите период">
          <el-option label="День" value="day" />
          <el-option label="Месяц" value="month" />
          <el-option label="Год" value="year" />
        </el-select>
      </el-form-item>

      <el-form-item label="Статус" prop="archive">
        <el-switch
          v-model="form.archive"
          active-text="Действующий"
          inactive-text="Не действующий"
        />
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>

    <template #footer>
      <el-button @click="onCancel">Отмена</el-button>
      <el-button type="primary" @click="onSubmit">Сохранить</el-button>
    </template>
  </el-dialog>
</template>

<script setup>
import { reactive, ref, computed, defineEmits, defineProps } from 'vue'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'

// Props & Emits
const props = defineProps({
  modelValue: { type: Boolean, required: true }
})
const emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue', 'create'])

// Visibility binding
const visible = computed({
  get: () => props.modelValue,
  set: v => emit('update:modelValue', v)
})

// Form state & validation
const formRef = ref(null)
const form = reactive({
  code: '',
  name: '',
  price: null,
  unit_measurement: 'month',
  archive: true
})
const rules = {
  code: [{ required: true, message: 'Введите код', trigger: 'blur' }],
  name: [{ required: true, message: 'Введите название', trigger: 'blur' }],
  price: [{ required: true, message: 'Введите цену', trigger: 'change' }]
}

// Handlers
const onSubmit = () => {
  formRef.value.validate(valid => {
    if (valid) {
      emit('create', { ...form })
      visible.value = false
      ElMessage.success('Тариф создан')
    }
  })
}

const onCancel = () => {
  visible.value = false
}
defineExpose
</script>

<style scoped>
.card-header { /* Берем стиль из родителя, если нужно */ }
</style>
